title: Hour 1: All Rise!
description:
Chris "Mad Dog" Russo says Aaron Judge set the true home run record, after hitting his 62nd home run of the season. Dominque Foxworth believes the Packers do not need to sign OBJ. Plus, Stephen A. is putting his confidence in Joe Burrow not Lamar Jackson to win on Sunday. Later Kimberly Martin joins the show to discuss what to expect from Kenny Pickett in his first NFL start.
